channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OnePlus Watch Lite Announced, With High-End Features At Lower Cost
item.description: OnePlus has confirmed the existence of the Watch Lite, which will get a full announcement on December 17th alongside a new phone and tablet.

item.title: OnePlus 15R Announced With Release Date And Pre-Order Special Offer
item.description: The next OnePlus phone will go on sale in December. The company has announced it with details of colors and how to buy it with a free case, charger an...

item.title: Netflix’s Likely Oscar Nominee Has A 95% Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Netflix has a new original film that has a 95% Rotten Tomatoes score and a chance at a Best Picture or more at the Oscars this year.

item.title: Is Gemini 3 Kicking Off The Agentic Economy?
item.description: Gemini 3 updates signal an agentic economy, where AI systems not only reason and answer but also build apps, run workflows, and reshape software and s...

item.title: Millions Of Online Identities Stolen—Are You Now At Risk?
item.description: McAfee buys MineOS consumer privacy business to stop millions of users losing their identities.

item.title: Marketing lessons from the Grateful Dead
item.description: Of course, a book with a title like this gives us pause–when we think of marketers, we don’t ordinarily think about Jerry, Phil, Bobby and the rest of...

item.title: On meeting spec

item.title: Infantilization
item.description: The worst sort of powerlessness happens when we’re seduced into doing it to ourselves.

item.title: A convincing argument

item.title: Hard work and goodwill
item.description: The other day, Tom Cruise gave a long acceptance speech. But unlike every other speech of its kind, there were no notes. No rambling. No false starts....
